DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine normative range brain volume brain volume change healthy control ( HC ) participant whose age , race , gender distribution approximately match age , race , gender distribution patient Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) enrol Study 888MS001 . The secondary objective use result primary endpoint ensure consistency brain volume measurement across MS PATHS center .
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion Criteria Ability understand purpose risk study provide sign date informed consent authorization use protect health information accordance national local participant privacy regulation . Key Exclusion Criteria History human immunodeficiency virus . Confirmed suspect pregnancy . Diagnosis migraine require medication participantreported diagnosis neurological disease condition ( e.g. , stroke , transient ischemic attack , epilepsy , brain infection , brain surgery , prior head injury concussion , brain tumor ) . Any participantreported diagnosis autoimmune disorder ( e.g. , rheumatoid arthritis , Sj√∂gren 's syndrome , scleroderma , systemic lupus erythematosus ) . Standard MRI exclusion criterion , include claustrophobia , inability lay still magnet ( e.g. , tremor ) , type implant metal body would affect strong magnetic field . NOTE : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply
